amendment.description: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to expand access to breastfeeding accommodations in the workplace, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6595, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 92 - 5. Record Vote Number: 417.

action.text: Amendment SA 6595 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 6552. (consideration: CR S10072-10073; text: CR S10063) To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to expand access to breastfeeding accommodations in the workplace, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6595 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 6552.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6595, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 92 - 5. Record Vote Number: 417.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 6595, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 92 - 5. Record Vote Number: 417.
